title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
content: Hi guys and girls! I am building a website https://easyinvest.one/ and its getting closer to be done.I would love some ideas and tips if you have any so I can improve the website.Feel free to say anything. I love criticism and take it to heart and develop the site. But if you're going to be rude and mean, you don't need to write. I don't have time for that kind of nonsense.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: This would only be a site with fake reviews. There have been many of these sites that I have seen before, telling people how to trade and invest, but what do end it is scam.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: This sounds like a scam. You offer 30% profit which is impossible in the long term (longer than two months).If you can make 30% profit, why do you need other people and their money? you will very easily increase your capital and make a profit without having to share it with someone.QuoteWe offer a guaranteed investment over two months where your profit is 30% on your investment.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on October 12, 2022, 06:47:16 AMI would love some ideas and tips if you have any so I can improve the website.Here are a few:Get rid of the stock photos and replace them with real photos!Do the same thing with all of the fake reviews [it doesn't take a genius to figure out those are fake]!Provide an in-depth explanation with regard to your so-called "special program"!- This isn't the first time I'm seeing these two words together and on all of the previous occasions, none of them could provide valid proof for its existence.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The website contains a referral link, so I think that the purpose of the whole story is to indirectly click on that link and try to collect referral commission.I don't know about referral link policies, but it looks like you're trying to scam people by fake investment offers to click on that link.Try to find a more creative and persuasive way to promote your referral links and then people will be happy to get your referral commission.
